thread.title: NASCAR WAGs get really wound up about Chase elimination race
thread.title_full: NASCAR WAGs get really wound up about Chase elimination race

title: NASCAR WAGs get really wound up about Chase elimination race
text:
NASCAR WAGs Amy Reimann (left), Lorra Bowyer and Samantha Busch made their feelings known Sunday on Twitter. Jasen Vinlove/USA TODAY,Jared C. Tilton & Will Schneekloth/Getty Images FOX Sports Jared Turner - Shake and Bake Crew Share This Story Updated Oct 5, 2015 at 2:57p ET 
Sunday's Chase elimination race at Dover International Speedway wasn't just stressful for the drivers involved. It was also stressful for their significant others. 
How do we know? 
Several WAGs -- most notably Amy Reimann (fiancee of Dale Earnhardt Jr .), Samantha Busch (wife of Kyle Busch ), Sherry Pollex (girlfriend of Martin Truex Jr .), Lorra Bowyer (wife of Clint Bowyer ) and DeLana Harvick (wife of race winner Kevin Harvick ) -- used Twitter on Sunday to make their voices heard. 
Not surprisingly, the emotions expressed by the WAGs ranged from jubilant to nervous to downright ticked off in the case of Pollex, who was clearly steamed about NASCAR ordering her boyfriend to start at the back after issues in pre-race inspection. 
Here's a sampling of what they had to say: true ‚Äî Amy Reimann (@Amy_Reimann) October 4, 2015 Holy moly that was too stressful! That restart tho...BADASS! Congrats honey! ‚Äî Amy Reimann (@Amy_Reimann) October 4, 2015 Anyone have any headache meds? Don't think I remembered to breathe the last 20 laps. ‚Äî Amy Reimann (@Amy_Reimann) October 4, 2015 Since 08 only cup race missed was in 2010. Sad not 2 b at track but was nervous 4 flight w Brex w this weather. Praying for 18 success üèÅüèÜ ‚Äî Samantha Busch (@SamanthaBusch) October 4, 2015 By one point Thank you God! The 18 team is going to round 2 in the chase!!! Happy tears in this house right now!!!! ‚Äî Samantha Busch (@SamanthaBusch) October 4, 2015 Hmmmm. Equal rules for everyone?!! I'm confused. üò≥ ‚Äî Sherry Pollex (@SherryPollex) October 4, 2015 Woohoo!! Proud of our guys and MT. From the back to the front today!! On to the next round! üí™üèÅüëç #nevergiveup
